reviews.review: MT BOM

This game is so fucking terrible, The matchmaking is absolutely atrocious with unbearably unbalanced matches and the hit-boxes, de-sync and general functioning of this game is so terrible its like children learned how to use a game engine. I am never able to have a functioning match in this game and it just keeps getting worse with every update.

2021/02/10の致命的なアプデによるｸｿUI変更やｸｿサバイバーモーション変更の結果のヒットボックスバグ？等は他の方が沢山言われてるので
もう一つ致命的なバグとしてサバイバーのランク評価システムがバグってて
このゲームは4つのカテゴリで動きを判断してその4つのカテゴリそれぞれで高評価を得て総合評価でランクが上がるってシステムなのに
その内の1つがバグってるから今までだとランクポイント(pip)獲得でランクが上げられてる、もしくはランクが維持できてるなんて動きでも
pipが貰えなくてランクが上がらない、もしくはpip没収でランクが下がったなんて報告が多数です。

まぁサバイバーである程度のランクになるとマッチング時間が延びるだけなので気にしない人は良いかもしれませんが
ランク上位を目指したいという新規や初心者中級者の方、上手くプレイしたと思うのに評価されないのが気になる方は
バグ修正を待つのが吉ですかね…。

If you're into slasher flicks, give it a shot! It pays homage to lots of Horror movies from classics such as Halloween, Nightmare on Elm Street, and Scream to modern ones such as the video game 'Silent Hill' and the netflix series 'Stranger Things'. It's really fun to play with your friends, especially working together with comms. You can still run it solo depending on the build you made for your character. All I could say is that I've been enjoying it a lot lately (Mostly playing as a survivor though). Go on, give it a try. :)

LEIAM ATÉ O FINAL PARA ENTENDER O MOTIVO DA ANÁLISE NEGATIVA, POSSUINDO MIL HORAS DE JOGO:
O conceito do jogo é ótimo. 
O problema é tudo que vem junto com ele.... Dead By Daylight provavelmente nunca vai ter uma concorrência grande por conta das licenças, esse é o único jogo em que é possivel jogar com Michael Myers, Phyramid Head do Sillent Hill, Freddy Krueger do A nightmare on elm street, etc....
Isso seria maravilhoso, se o jogo não fosse mal otimizado, desbalanceado (é inegável que em uma partida com todos os jogadores sendo bons, os sobreviventes tem MUITA VANTAGEM em cima do assassino, e não o contrário) e a cada atualização isso piora, o jogo tem uma quantia RIDÍCULA de bugs e a cada atualização piora.
No momento dessa análise (16.10.2021) está pra sair outra atualização, que vai deixar o jogo mais desbalanceado ainda e assim como todas os updates que teve desde que eu comecei a jogar, sem exceção, vai vir algum bug novo que vai deixar o jogo estressante até 2 meses depois os devs arrumarem.
A Behaviour (dona do jogo) não liga pro público, além de tudo isso que eu falei, está rolando uma onda de hackers estadunidenses mantendo as pessoas na partida por até 2 horas ou até elas quitarem, e mesmo com provas e tickets CLAROS DE HACKING os desenvolvedores não fazem nada a respeito. Fora a quantia de mapas que são desativados por 2 a 3 meses por um bug em algum canto específico e eles se importam mais em trazer skin nova de sobrevivente pra faturar dinheiro do que consertar a porcaria do próprio jogo.
Meu animo com dead by daylight passou a muito tempo, a única coisa que me faz manter essa porcaria baixada ainda é jogar com amigos pela companhia, o jogo não vale nem um pouco a pena.

What was supposed to be a fun party game, turned into a very toxic "competitive" game.
Survivors do not understand killers and vice versa, it should be mandatory to play both sides, being a survivor main or a killer main and only playing one of those roles puts people in a "me against you" situation that creates toxicity.

Now, is this game "FUN"? , it is yes, when it works ,which is pretty much 10% or less of the time, so no i would not recommend this game.

Devs need to listen to the feedback people are giving specially some fog whisperers and stop listening to whinning little kids on reddit.

They have a PTB that hey gather feedback from and they and completly ignore everything people tell them about the state of the game, and go ahead and make changes that not only (most of the time) break the game completly but were unnecessary.

What this game needs,(and the Devs know) is a bearth of freash air and a TON of fixes and reworks of core mechanics of the game.

All things aside i find myself most of the time frustrated and annoying when playing this game , and i would not recommend it to anyone.

The team behind the game aren't very keen on communicating properly with their customer base or keeping the game healthy. 
I had to uninstall the game after a months period of active playing because of the newest update. They have managed to break the ranking system as well as the hitboxes, while introducing new bugs and opportunities for gameplay abuse on the new maps, rendering the game unplayable. That in itself would be excusable, if they hadn't actively ignored the community opinion as well as play testers who kept informing them of these problems, which they don't seem to be enthusiastic to address.

Really huge props to the art department though! They manage to pull off an atmosphere that is very unique and genuinely great to immerse into, audio - and visual wise. The new HUD is a real eyesore though.

This game truly has the potential to be one of the best. The cat-and-mouse gameplay mixed with a spooky aesthetic, and the featuring of many classic horror movie icons and maps, are [i] huge [/i] draws of interest.

Unfortunately, Dead By Daylight is squandered by developers who are more interested in adding expensive cosmetics, battle passes, and DLCs, rather than making sure their updates are both in the interest of the community and bug-free. The truth is - the lack of real competition in the genre (mainly due to licensing) is what keeps DBD on top.

After playing for over 2 years and having seen bounds of controversy with nearly every patch, a toxic player-base rivaling that of the notorious League of Legends, lackluster updates that are infrequent, bugged, and even unwanted by the community - and especially the pure disregard shown to veteran players by the developers - I simply cannot bring myself to recommend this game.

If you like to rage when gaming, then this is the game for you.
So many bugs, they take months to fix them and when they do, they just create a bunch of new ones. Right now is unplayable for survivors (or at very least no fun at all).

Honestly I don't even have strong feelings about the update, it's still the same game whatever. 

But holy god there is literally nothing but cancer left playing it. It's like all the people actually enjoying themselves left from the update and all you have now are the sweatiest, dirtiest, smelliest, least fun try hards congregating on one game. 

If you're looking to get it I'd say give it a while and see if there is some return because right now oh boy is it no fun.

Once it stops being absolute cancer aids I'll edit to be a recommended, until then I can't wish this upon my worst enemies.
